common.accessTools: Access your tools and track real-time information
common.exploreFeatures: Explore all features available for your account

auth.loginSubtitle: Welcome to Love to Fly Portal

dashboard.noNews: No news available at the moment

navigation.name: Air Navigation
navigation.description: Essential tools for flight planning and execution with precision
navigation.e6b: Classic air navigation calculator. Convert between units, calculate flight time, required fuel, correct wind drift and solve real navigation problems
navigation.glasscockpit: Advanced flight deck simulator with modern avionics. Practice procedures, system operation and instrumentation in a realistic environment
navigation.ifr: Specialized instrument flight simulator. Develop IFR skills, practice instrument approaches and emergency procedures
navigation.flightplan: Plan complete routes, calculate required fuel, optimal altitudes, flight time and operational costs. Generate automatic briefing

weather.name: Aeronautical Meteorology
weather.description: Accurate and updated meteorological information for safe flight decisions
weather.metar: Real-time weather condition queries for any airport. Automatic decoding, critical condition alerts and 48-hour history
weather.radar: Real-time weather radar with storm cell movement projection. Essential tool for safe routing

training.name: Training & Certification
training.description: Continuous skills development through courses, logbook and simulated practice
training.logbook: Complete record of all your flight hours with categories, automatic statistics briefing and export for certifications
training.courses: Course catalog for pilots on various topics: procedures, ANAC regulations, aerodynamics, meteorology and more
training.simulator: Access to professional simulator for training, emergency procedure practice and skills maintenance

community.name: Aviation Community
community.description: Connect with pilots, share knowledge and trade equipment
community.forum: Space for technical discussions, experience sharing and questions with experienced pilots and instructors
community.marketplace: Buy and sell aeronautical equipment such as headsets, charts, manuals, software and pilot accessories

career.name: Career Opportunities
career.description: Find job openings, develop your career and connect with aviation mentors
career.jobs: Exclusive access to aviation job opportunities: airline pilots, private, agricultural, instructors and more
career.mentoring: Connect with experienced pilots and aviation professionals for career guidance, interview tips and networking

hangarshare.name: HangarShare - Hangar Rental
hangarshare.description: Complete platform for renting hangars at Brazilian airfields
hangarshare.search: Reserve hangars at Brazilian airdromes with competitive prices. Filter by size, type and location. Instant and secure booking
hangarshare.advertise: Monetize your idle space by renting to other pilots. Receive reservations, manage payments and track revenue in real-time
hangarshare.bookings: Manage all your active and historical reservations, track invoices and communicate directly with owners

insurance.title: Aviation Insurance
insurance.subtitle: Instant Quote
insurance.compareInsurers: We compare the best insurance companies in the market
